name: Jewel Puzzle Click
description:
If you like simple match 3 games, then try Jewel Puzzle Click game.

It is a game that you just need to find jewels of the same type that are close to each other and click on them to make them disappear and earn points.

It is a very simple game with easy achievements to be completed.

Features

- Simple mechanic, click in jewels each to next others to make them dissappear
- 40 levels to complete
- 4 different types of missions (get target score, get the specific number of gemstones, remove tile colors, get a trophy to the bottom)
- 2 different completion modes (limited number of moves OR limited number of time)
- Each level completed
